website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting cake eyeliner that resists moisture and goes on smoothly. It offers the precision of liquid liner but is easier to apply.
pros: A dry cake eyeliner that comes with a small brush
Very easy to apply: simply dampen brush
Wears for hours, even on oily skin
Doesn't smudge or transfer yet is easy to remove
Much more forgiving than liquid liner
Can also be used to fill in and define sparse brows
cons: Requires a wet brush, so not an all-in-one product, but brush is included

customer_reviews.title: Versatile line quality, thick or thin, light or dark.
customer_reviews.text: I like that with cake liner I can make the line lighter or darker with how wet the brush is. I can soften a harsh line by brushing over the margins with a wet brush. Often I apply a lighter (thinner cake/ more water) thick line and go back with a very dark line just along the edge of lashes. It doesn't seem to last more than about 8 hours without seeming to get rubbed off (do I do that??), but it is pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: avid rita

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Clinique discontinued this product years ago, and ever since I have looked for another eyeliner that I liked as well with no success. I don't know how long it has been back on the market, but I'm sure glad it is!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Misner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 60 somethings.
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a cake eyeliner that will work with my 63 year old eye site and eyelids. This one is just perfect! I apply it with a damp eyeshadow sponge and it goes on great. I also use it on my very sparse 63 year old eyebrows and it looks very natural. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and I love the way it looks, you can make it darker or very light. This will be my go to eyeliner now! I am 62 years old
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Chaparro

customer_reviews.title: Easily applied and stays
customer_reviews.text: I found this product from Instagram @Lowcarb.Nancy she wears it and looks great... I'm sold on it now.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Much easier to control when applying.
customer_reviews.text: It does tend to smear a bit during the day. But It is so easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Bodenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: This is the only 'water resistant' cake eyeliner I've found and I've used it for years and years. I love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Stays on longer than pencil eyeliners and of course, love the Clinique name.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Goog color
customer_reviews.text: Good color. Wish it lasted longer before having to re apply.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Newt

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and lasts until I take my makeup ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eyeliner for years. It is easy to use and lasts until I take my makeup off at night. Goes on very easily. I Love It !
customer_reviews.author: young at heart

customer_reviews.title: Love the Clinque eyeliner and that it's so easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the Clinque eyeliner and that it's so easy to use. Not to metion - water proof. So crying won't wash it away!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply and control the intensity of the color. But I think the product is old. The block of color is very loose in the case like it shrank. I'm disappointed and feel the price was exorbitant. It's not the great product I remember.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good eyeliner, easy to apply and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Worker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. It's not as heavy as liquid eyeliners.
customer_reviews.author: PatK

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find this
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find this! Beautiful coverage. You can control the depth of the color with the dilution of water and no flaking :)
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Is it possible that Clinique is discontinuing their cake eyeliner ...
customer_reviews.text: Is it possible that Clinique is discontinuing their cake eyeliner again? Sure hope not. Have used for years & there is no alternative for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and have been using it for years, because it lasts for years. The brush is nice and very fine so the liner will go on as thin or as thick as you'd like. It's a dry cake and you just add water to the brush then glide across the cake before applying. This product is not waterproof, it's durable but if your eyes water or get wet, it will come off.
customer_reviews.author: smadainot

customer_reviews.title: Makes an Oldster Look Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this eyeliner probably for 20 years. The older I get, the worse I get putting on eyeliner. This is always forgiving in that department and makes me look great for being the age I am. I love it and will use it as long as they make it. I wish I had taken a photo before I took off my makeup after work. Oh, well...
customer_reviews.author: sambakmom

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, ease, & comfort of eyeliner!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The soft brush only needs water to moisten the cake eyeliner. Draws perfect lines. Very easy & long lasting!
customer_reviews.author: Julywoman

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Been using this for many years and it’s becoming hard to find. Lasts a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Love Clinique.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Nice not having to hit a mall for one item.
customer_reviews.author: gayle z.

customer_reviews.title: have used this product in the past but this one ...
customer_reviews.text: have used this product in the past but this one seems different, was always creamy, this seems to be very dry
customer_reviews.author: nonilynn

customer_reviews.title: Still my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Being using this product for years! Easy to apply and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: JDY

customer_reviews.title: WHY MESS WITH PERFECTION IN A PRODUCT?
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt, the best eyeliner out there.. ever.. a standard and classic .. I will never use anything else again.. its the very best
customer_reviews.author: bess gw

product_meta.title: Water Resistant Eyeliner #12 Muted Brown - 2.8g/0.1oz
product_meta.description: Soft & gentle to apply on the delicate lash line area Ideally defines the desired shape of your eyes The waterproof benefit prevents smudging & ensures long wearing A good choice for sensitive eyes Comes with a unique brush for precise application Dermatologist testedProduct Line: Clinique - Brow & Liner - Water Resistant EyelinerProduct Size: 2.8g/0.1oz
